transcript: [Music] Iron Man okay so it's safe to say that Iron Man 2 has some pretty huge shoes to fill Not only was Iron Man 1 in my opinion one of the coolest movies of o08 but one of the coolest impressive if not really freaking difficult now Iron Man 2 it did have its good and bad like I said Robert Downey Jr he's just great they did some stuff with the character of Tony Stark I wasn't are in the movie it's all the story arcs that are in the movie I mean if Tony Stark were just battling the bean en counters in Washington DC and trying to keep the Iron Man suit out of the hands of the arms dealers I mean that would have been just fine right there but there about four to five other plot lines that Tony Stark's dealing with in the movie also it just makes it feel all cluttered I drunk you know it's kind of pathetic to watch you just watch it and you're like Tony Stark losing respect for Tony Stark it's that Tony Stark it's not Iron Man it's like Iron Man's drunk douchy stepbrother twice removed and I will say this now even though I know I'm going to get comments about it later I know that this is a story arc that's dealt with in the comic books and I know that there's a story based reason for it happening in the movie I'm just saying watching Tony Stark the character that we all loved and connected with in the first one all down in the dumps in the dark part of his liful self-destructive style for an hour and 45 minutes is just kind of a drag and yes I know that in sequels the character needs to be challenged in ways that he wasn't challenged in the first one but you can challenge him without making him kind of douchy that's all his attitude in this movie is that he doesn't give a [ __ ] and because of that you don't either that's all I'm saying and okay now the dialogue there are scenes where the dialogue is well written and well delivered in this movie but then there are other scenes where the dialogue's being delivered at the same time like two people are talking at the exact same time it just feels like this are you listening go to the press conference you know can't the Press confence you have to go to thison man you need to go be cool we all saw it in the trailer where War Machine and Iron Man are just thrown down with a bunch of mechs it was cool fun exciting until it abruptly ended in a 45sec fight with the main bad guy so I won't tell you not to see this movie that would be impossible everyone's going to see this movie you you have to after watching Iron Man 1 and it's not horrible it's not like Spider-Man 3 or anything it's just not like Spider-Man one 2 X-Men one 2 Iron Man one either of the Nolan Batman's better than X-Man 3 I think whereas the first one stands out you think cool comic book movie or cool comic book hero you thinkk Iron Man but in a world where sequels are rarely as good as the original this one's just kind of part for the chorus so it's a fun movie that's a bit convoluted and if you're
